Summary: It was very large and very noisy it sounded like there was somEthing wrong and it looked like a smudge in the sky
trends: There have been 76 other sightings in Calgary
There were no other sightings in Calgary on or around May 6th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMy house. Began to shake and it sounded like a rocket flying through the air my Pit bull got very very scared and ran into the bathrOom I went out on to my deck and started looking for what was going on I couldn't see anything at first but new there was something very close as the cups on the table were shaking then I seen what looked to be a smudge in the sky about 50 feet in front of me and about 80 feet in the air it looked very camaflouged and it flew slowly right above my house as it passed over I ran through the house and out the front door and observed it for about another 100 feet the. It just went silent and disappeared completely it was fully trippy and dispite my excitement it weirded me out on how bad it scared my pitbull and cat!
